name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior SAP Engineer with a strong aptitude for configuration, troubleshooting, and root-cause analysis, complemented by over 13 years of experience as a Full Stack Developer in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-performance solutions while leveraging analytical and problem-solving skills. Excellent communicator with a proven ability to navigate complex challenges effectively.

Expertise in developing applications using **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in building AI/ML-powered platforms and deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**. Skilled in implementing microservices and event-driven architectures, alongside CI/CD pipelines. Familiar with compliance standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2, and MLOps techniques including **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
